meanings.definition: Chemical substances that are used to kill germs and bacteria.
meanings.sent1: The hospital uses disinfectants to clean the rooms and keep patients safe.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to use disinfectants on kitchen countertops to prevent the spread of germs.
meanings.sent3: The disinfectants went on strike, claiming they were tired of always fighting germs.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a powerful disinfectant, wiping away all the negativity in the room.
meanings.sent5: The disinfectants worked tirelessly, battling the germs with unwavering determination.

meanings.definition: Agents that are applied to surfaces to reduce the number of pathogens.
meanings.sent1: After the party, she used disinfectants to clean the tables and chairs.
meanings.sent2: Schools often use disinfectants to keep classrooms clean and prevent illnesses.
meanings.sent3: The disinfectants threw a surprise party for the pathogens, hoping to make peace.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as a disinfectant, cleansing the room of any lingering doubts.
meanings.sent5: The disinfectants worked like superheroes, fighting off the pathogens to protect everyone.
